bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Hall family were prominent residents of Tarboro, N.C. Thomas H. Hall (1773-1853; sometimes referred to as Thomas E. Hall) was a physician in Tarboro who also served as U.S. Congressman and as a member of the N.C. State Senate.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of two letters. First is a letter to Edward Hall from William R. Davie, concerning a legal case, [1795?], and second is a letter from Thomas H. Hall to the North Carolina land office concerning the issue of a land warrant, 1820.
